G

GameControl - Class in stacs
The GameControl class is responsible for managing the state and logic of the Hangman game.

Constructs a GameControl object with the specified guess word.
GameView - Class in stacs
The GameView use to show the game's information of state.

GameWord - Class in stacs
This class use to generate the random word from word list file.
GameWord() - Constructor for class stacs.GameWord
 
getAlreadyGuessedLetters() - Method in class stacs.GameControl
Retrieves a list of characters that have already been guessed.
getCurrentGuessWord() - Method in class stacs.GameControl
This method returns a string representation of the current guessed word, where each correctly guessed letter is shown in its correct position and unguessed letters are represented by underscores.
getGuessWord() - Method in class stacs.GameControl
guessWord have used Private to decorate, so other class can't interview directly.
getHangmanImage() - Method in class stacs.GameControl
This method mainly use to show Hangman's Images in the console log through the rest times of guessing.
getRandomWord() - Static method in class stacs.GameWord
Retrieves a random word from a predefined list of words.
getRemainingTimes() - Method in class stacs.GameControl
Gets the number of remaining attempts the player has to guess the word.
guessResult(char) - Method in class stacs.GameControl
This method first converts the guessed letter to lowercase to ensure case-insensitive comparison.

Initializes and runs the Hangman game user interface.
hangmanImages - Static variable in class stacs.GameView
This method draw the different parts of Hangman's body Drawn from bottom to top are Hangman's head, body, left hand, right hand, left foot, and right foot.

isAttempt() - Method in class stacs.GameControl
This method use to checks if the player has any attempts remaining to guess the word.
isWordEqual() - Method in class stacs.GameControl
This method use to checks if the current guessed word matches the original guess word exactly.

R

runGameLoop(GameControl, Scanner) - Static method in class stacs.GameView
Executes the game loop, accepting user input and updating the game state until the game concludes.
